name: RI_1_1_21_Link_Record_Lifecycle_Event
title: RI.1.1.21 Link Record Lifecycle Event (Function)
description: Link Record Entries (2 or more instances)
purpose:
Occurs when an agent causes the system to connect related record entries. 

Reference: ISO 21089-2018, Section 15.21.

statement.label: RI.1.1.21#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to link patient Record Entries logically according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.
